Signs and Symptoms Approximate number of patients (when available) Abnormal hair quantity 90% Reduced number of teeth 90% Taurodontia 90% Abnormality of the fingernails 50% Broad alveolar ridges 50% Hypoplastic toenails 50% Autosomal recessive inheritance - Oligodontia - Sparse hair - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
